text: Ane anathone te'ona pukhtavaye pahoci jatam sudhi sudharata raho ane kasoti karata raho, pachi jo te lokomam tame samajadari ane uttama yukti jo'i lo to temane temanum dhana sompi do ane temana pukhtavaye pahonci javana bhayathi temana dhanane jhadapathi bekara kharca na kari do, dhanavano mate jaruri che ke (te'ona dhanathi) bacata rahe. Ham lacara, niradhara hoya to kayada mujaba je jarurata hoya te kha'i lem, pachi te'one te'onum ghana sompati vakhate saksi banavi lo, kharekhara hisaba lenara allaha ja purato che
